lines.i: Set of times for defined events in the EMS trip

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.10"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67667-6" EMS times Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10820)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Times" (CONF:10822)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10821)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11053)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Call Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.38)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11055)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit Notified Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.39)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11057)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit En Route Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.40)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11059)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit On Scene Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.41)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11061)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit At Patient Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.42)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11063)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit Left Scene Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.43)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11065)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Arrived At Destination Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.44)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11067)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit Back In Service Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.45)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:11069)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Dispatch Notified Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.46)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67667-6" EMS times Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10820)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Times" (CONF:10822)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10821)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11053)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Call Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.38)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11055)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit Notified Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.39)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11057)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit En Route Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.40)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11059)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit On Scene Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.41)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11061)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit At Patient Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.42)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11063)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit Left Scene Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.43)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11065)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Arrived At Destination Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.44)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11067)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit Back In Service Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.45)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:11069)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Dispatch Notified Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.46)
